sentences.sentence: Such a trend has not been substantively reversed during the five interest rate hikes this year.
sentences.translation: 造成的结果是，国内贷款的实际比例最后大于统计数据。 今年经过五次加息也没有实质性地改变这一趋势。

sentences.sentence: Our mission now questions how much the Saudis can now substantively influence the crude markets over the long term.
sentences.translation: 现在，我们的任务在质疑究竟沙特在原油市场上能产生多少实质性的长期影响。

sentences.sentence: It was George Osborne, the chancellor of the exchequer, who bore the burden of substantively rejecting the case for fiscal loosening.
sentences.translation: 财政大臣乔治-奥斯伯恩在反对财政宽松这件事上是承担实际责任的人。
